title: Strengthening Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Mobile Technology Utilization Course for Accounting Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 90% task completion rates when performing accounting process simulations via a mobile gamification app

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
